Package indexer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractIndexer
    Defines the common functionalities to be performed by an indexer object.
    BaseDirInfo
    Utility class to 'translate' relative paths from project bases to absolute paths of the file system in the target machine.
    ExtractedInfoIndexer
    Class to manage loading/storing of extracted values for each attribute.
    ExtractedInfoRetriever
    Enables searching/loading of extracted values from the web service.
    PaperIndexer  
    Paragraph
    A paragraph object to be stored in a paragraph index.
    PassageRetriever
    Acts as an utility class for query construction and retrieval from a Lucene index.
    ResearchDoc
    A class to represent the in-memory structure of the Lucene index format.
    SentenceBasedParagraphBuilder
    This class is used to split a document into sentences instead of fixed word-length paragraphs.
    ShingleAnalyzer
    Provides the functionality to take into word level n-grams for matching passages with queries.
    SlindingWindowParagraphBuilder
    Contains utility classes for splitting a document into fixed length word windows.
    WordVecTrainingFileGenerator
    Generates a text file (concatenated text extracted from all documents in the collection) to learn word vector representations using standard approaches, such as word2vec.
